overview: The eleven young and hung guys in this film are truly sex-driven and continuously horny. Whenever and wherever they happen to encounter each other - in the kitchen, the bathroom, living room or bedroom — they crave hot sex. In five bareback scenes, four sexy duos and a hot threesome, they no sooner find each other than they dive into it. Alex Clark directed this gathering of young Russian guys for Raw Entry Club.
title: Young, Horny And Bareback
